snippet.title: Girl With A Lazer Shotgun Official Trailer #2 (2020)
snippet.description:
Girl With A Lazer Shotgun is a fast paced, run and gun shooter that finds you crash landed on a mysterious world, pursued by your ex who's using a mind control crystal to send the creatures of the planet after you. Luckily, you've got your handy dandy lazer shotgun, and will have to blast through 10 levels of arcade action to escape. 

You can find me: 
On Twitter:  twitter.com/UncannyVallerie
On Itch.io:   valerie-paris.itch.io
On Instagram: /www.instagram.com/valerieparis_is_burning

I'm generally friendly and don't bite so feel free to DM me if you have any thoughts or questions about the project!
